channel.title: CVE Feed for mgetty -- mgetty
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mgetty -- mgetty

item.title: CVE-2019-1010189|2024-08-05T03:07:18.428Z -- mgetty -- mgetty
item.description: mgetty prior to version 1.2.1 is affected by: Infinite Loop. The impact is: DoS, the program does never terminates. The component is: g3/g32pbm.c. The attack vector is: Local, the user should open a specially crafted file. The fixed version is: 1.2.1.

item.title: CVE-2019-1010190|2024-08-05T03:07:18.312Z -- mgetty -- mgetty
item.description: mgetty prior to 1.2.1 is affected by: out-of-bounds read. The impact is: DoS, the program may crash if the memory is not mapped. The component is: putwhitespan() in g3/pbm2g3.c. The attack vector is: Local, the victim must open a specially crafted file. The fixed version is: 1.2.1.
